title: Print, "Bear and Its Cub (Komochiguma), No. 32", ca. 1910
markings: In graphite, lower left: Bear and its Cub
inscribed: Inscribed in black ink, lower left: [Japanese characters] / no. 32 / Komochiguma.
description: Two irises, outer perianth leaves in deep blue-purple; inner leaves purple.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Bear and Its Cub (Komochiguma), No. 32", ca. 1910.
ca. 1910. 40.8 x 27.9 cm (16 1/16 in. x 11 in.). Gift of Mary Rutherford Jay. 1948-134-85.
